title: Quarkus Extension Registry
summary: The Quarkus Extension Registry documentation describes how extension registries provide Quarkus dev tools with information about available Quarkus platforms and non-platform extensions, their compatibility, and update policies. It details the primary community extension registry at registry.quarkus.io, which is pre-configured in Quarkus dev tools and supports Maven-based configuration. Additionally, it covers custom client configuration for handling multiple registries and adjusting update policies for local caches, aimed at helping users manage Quarkus extensions in different deployment scenarios.
